sub_title: Master Image Consultant & Personal Brand Strategist for talented professional women and entrepreneurs who want to dress for success, feel confident, and stand out strategically to grow their businesses & careers!
summary:
I develop image strategies for talented professional women and entrepreneurs like you who want to feel confident, improve their reputation, be seen as experts and leaders, and take their careers and businesses to the next level.

Let's work together so you can finally dress for success!
Start standing out for the right reasons, instantly commanding authority and professionalism, connecting more quickly to your target audience, attracting the right opportunities, and putting your best foot forward before you say a word.

Want to know more? Then let's talk! :)
Schedule your free image strategy call with me here: https://www.imagestrategyplatinum.com/yourcall

- 

The first thing I can say about myself is that I am an enthusiastic person: I am passionate about people, the power of self-confidence, and the amazing effect it can have on our lives and relationships.

Communication is my strong suit, and I have been working as an image consultant and personal brand strategist for the past 14 years, helping hundreds of clients from all around the world dress for success to reach their goals.

My mission is to help people use their non-verbal communication strategically and intentionally to show their personality, expertise, and skills to others authentically to attract better clients, jobs, and opportunities, feel more confident, and grow.

My background is IT: I have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science and worked in multinational companies in Brazil and Germany for over six years, leading and managing projects in USA, México and the UK until I decided, in 2008, to make the bold decision to begin a new career.

It was through my own corporate experience that I discovered the importance of dressing strategically, which is nothing more than aligning our non-verbal communication to all our potential and goals, so that we can convey the right first impression from the get-go before we even say a word.

Since then, I have assisted hundreds of clients in different parts of the world with my image strategy programs, and continue to be passionate about empowering women who want to reach new levels of self-confidence and success!

I am married, have two beautiful daughters, and have lived in the Netherlands since 2019.

Want to learn more?

Sign up for my free Image Strategy Secrets Masterclass here: https://www.imagestrategyplatinum.com/registration

company.name: Roberta Carlucci - Professional Image & Branding Consulting

profile_positions.company: Roberta Carlucci - Professional Image & Branding Consulting
profile_positions.description:
After 6 years working in IT, I founded Roberta Carlucci - Professional Image & Brand in 2008 with the purpose of assisting talented professional women & entrepreneurs in feeling confident and dressing for success.

My program enables you to develop an authentic image strategy to elevate your style and use your non-verbal communication to improve your reputation, instantly convey authority and professionalism, attract the right clients and opportunities, and take your career to the next level.

Done doing your daily Zoom meetings with your camera off and hiding from the spotlight?

Feeling frustrated in front of your closet, not knowing what to wear to show up professionally and confidently for your business meetings and interviews?

Want to convey a first and lasting impression that truly represents you and helps you grow your career or business, instead of holding you back and making you self-conscious?

Let's talk! :)

Book your free image strategy call with me here: https://www.imagestrategyplatinum.com/yourcall
profile_positions.title: Master Image Consultant & Personal Brand Strategist | Speaker | Entrepreneur

company.name: Roberta Carlucci - Consultoria de Imagem Pessoal e Corporativa

profile_positions.company: Roberta Carlucci - Consultoria de Imagem Pessoal e Corporativa
profile_positions.description:
In 2015, I decided to share the knowledge acquired with hundreds of clients and create a complete course to teach new image consultants the techniques behind this beautiful job with a very practical approach and my proven method, that brings visible results, empowers and makes a difference in our clients lives.

We had a total of 8 groups with students coming from different parts of Brazil and, in 2020, launched an online and improved version of the course for aspiring image consultants from around the world.

For more information, please visit our website: www.robertacarlucci.com.br/formacao

I offer also a mentorship program for new image consultants who want to have a thriving business and build an authentic reputation: www.robertacarlucci.com.br/mentoria
profile_positions.title: Teacher | Mentor | Image Consultant

profile_positions.description:
InSynch Global is a management consulting firm which provides innovative Career Management Programs to Executives, Middle Managers or Entrepreneurs.
We help our clients be insynch and achieve what they envision, whether they are changing jobs, function, industry, career, country, or lifestyle. 
Our programs are tailor-made and each client counts on a global and dedicated team of specialists, who assure deep analysis, through planning and effective action in their transitions.

As InSynch’s Personal Branding consultant and strategist, my responsibilities included a holistic analysis of our clients’ executive overall image and positioning, which covered personal branding, professional image, etiquette, body language, social media exposure and LinkedIn positioning, as well as protocols for networking events, interviews and follow-ups.

Keywords: Career Transition, Career Management, Leadership Development, Personal Branding, Corporate Etiquette, LinkedIn, Digital Footprint.
profile_positions.title: Personal Branding Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Sapient is a marketing and consulting company that provides business, marketing, and technology services to clients. The company operates three divisions, SapientNitro, Sapient Global Markets and Sapient Government Services. SapientNitro is an integrated digital marketing agency. Sapient Global Markets provides business and technology services and solutions to firms in the Capital Markets and Commodity industries. Sapient Government Services offers strategic, digital, and creative services to public sector clients.

I worked at Sapient on projects for O2 and Vodaphone, being responsible for quality processes, testing leadership, documentation and training, being part of highly international teams in fast pacing environments.
profile_positions.title: Senior Quality Assurance Specialist | Test Lead

profile_positions.description:
As a test consultant, I was responsible for developing the testing and quality assurance processes for the company, training and offering workshops for the team and the customers, test planning and managing all testing phases.

As a Quality Assurance Specialist, I was responsible for all reviews of the documentation, quality assurance reviews of our systems, bugs / issues tracking, and so on.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager | Test Consultant | Quality Assurance Specialist

profile_positions.description: As part of GTO (Global Testing Organization) within EDS, worked on projects in Brazil, USA and Mexico (Banamex) as the Quality Assurance Specialist/Leader, mentoring new teams and supervising all testing processes.
profile_positions.title: Product Quality Assurance Specialist | Test Lead

profile_positions.description:
Coordination and development of systems for mobile solutions and web-based corporate software using Java, Visual Basic (AppForge), ASP, VBScript, JavaScript, PHP and databases Oracle (PL/SQL) and MS Access.

Activities also included learning about the client’s activities and needs, requirement gathering/analysis in client’s site, planning project phases, acquiring resources and coordinating the team (ours and the clients), time, metrics and cost management, quality assurance and user
acceptance/feedback analysis.
profile_positions.title: Software developer, Project leader

volunteer_experiences.description:
Projeto que beneficiou as 6 mais necessitadas instituições sociais que atendem crianças e idosos na cidade de Florianópolis - SC:

1. Instituição de Caridade e Apoio ao Desamparado (ICAD): moradia coletiva para idosos de 60 anos ou mais, que possuem ou não o suporte familiar. A iniciativa da instituição, denominada Cantinho dos Idosos, atende atualmente 58 pessoas.

2. Ação Social Paroquial de Ingleses: atende atualmente 50 crianças entre 6 e 14 anos em situação de vulnerabilidade social. Lá contam com o apoio e suporte da instituição, mantendo-se deste modo fora das ruas e de situações de risco.

3. Associação Novo Alvorecer: em Coqueiros, atende hoje 80 crianças de 5 a 15 anos, oferecendo aulas de música e atividades que envolvem artes, esporte, aulas de inglês e reforço escolar.

4. Associação de Pais e Amigos do Menor: situada no bairro Areias do Morro das Pedras, atende cerca de 100 crianças, com idades de 6 a 14 anos. 

5. Associação Gente Amiga: na Agronômica, atende 80 crianças e adolescentes de 6 a 15 anos e oferece oficinas de profissionalização em artesanato, patchwork e outros, além de apoio pedagógico, oficinas educacionais e aulas de esportes.

6. Sociedade Espírita de Recuperação, Trabalho e Educação: a entidade presta assistência a 55 idosos e 20 crianças, todos abrigados em regime de 24 horas, além de 150 crianças na educação infantil. No ambiente atuam cuidadores, enfermeiros, assistentes sociais, professores, médicos e psicólogos.

Meu papel como colaboradora foi o de divulgar e angariar doações de pessoas físicas e/ou empresas para multiplicar o alcance do projeto e podermos ajudar de forma mais efetiva estas entidades com o envolvimento de toda a sociedade.

Para mais informações: 
- www.robertacarlucci.com.br/blog/12010/projeto-social-maos-a-obra/
- www.facebook.com/MaosAObraFlorianopolis
- www.instagram.com/maosaobraflorianopolis

volunteer_experiences.role: Mentora no Global Mentoring Walk 2017, em Florianópolis
volunteer_experiences.description:
Mentora voluntária no Global Mentoring Walk 2017 em Florianópolis, evento global que acontece em 59 países para oferecer suporte e mentoria para empreendedoras, promovido pela rede Vital Voices em conjunto com a Rede Mulher Empreendedora.

Tema oferecido na mentoria: "A importância do marketing pessoal e da imagem profissional para alavancar seus negócios e sua autoestima."
